Content:: Minority The Idaho Senate is the upper chamber of the Idaho State Legislature. It consists of 35 Senators elected to two-year terms,[1] each representing a district of the state. The Senate meets at the Idaho State Capitol in Boise, Idaho.[2] Since 1960, the Idaho Senate has been controlled by the Republican Party.[3] Since December 1, 2018, Republicans have held 27 seats and Democrats have 7.
